alert.note: Alert for Coastal Dixie; Inland Dixie (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 15 at 2:08PM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Dixie County through 300 PM EDT... At 207 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 9 miles northeast of Horseshoe Point, or 9 miles south of Cross City, moving southeast at 10 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Suwannee, Yellow Jacket and Shired Island. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
